title: AI Project Practice
Newnew

content:
Hugo Blog Setup Guide Introduction Hugo is a static site generator written in Go language, featuring fast speed, powerful functionality, and ease of use.
Installing Hugo Windows Installation Download Hugo Extended version Extract to specified directory Add to system PATH Create New Site 1 2 hugo new site myblog cd myblog Choose Theme Hugo has rich themes to choose from, recommend using Stack theme:
1 git clone https://github.com/CaiJimmy/hugo-theme-stack.git themes/hugo-theme-stack Configure Site Configure site information in hugo.yaml:
1 2 3 baseurl: https://yourdomain.com title: My Blog theme: hugo-theme-stack Create Content 1 hugo new post/my-first-post.md Local Preview 1 hugo server -D Deployment GitHub Pages Create GitHub repository Configure GitHub Actions Push code for automatic deployment Summary Hugo is an excellent static site generator, suitable for building personal blogs, technical documentation, and other websites.
title: Hugo Blog Setup Guide
